TopicTitle: Proper 3D screenshots where you can rotate crafts now available!

Articles.Content:
A website called "Sketchfab" now offers a KSP exporter to create and embed fully rotateable 3D views of your craft!

How to:

[https://vimeo.com/127469305](https://vimeo.com/127469305)

Sing up:

[https://skfb.ly/EDJM](https://skfb.ly/EDJM)

This was shown by the KSP page on facebook quite a while ago, but it was too difficult to upload a craft. This has now changend.

**Hint:** Make a clean clone of the vanilla game, add the compatible mods and upload your crafts from that folder. That way you can be sure that the textures arenÃ‚Â´t corrupted by things like ATM or others.

**Guys, a whole new era of KSP "screenshots" has just begun!**

Give it a try!

EDIT: **Troubleshooting**

-Errormessage (Object has no length): Make sure you donÃ‚Â´t run incompatible mods.

-No textures applied: You downloaded the alpha tool, go back to [github.com/sketchfab/ksp-exporter/releases](github.com/sketchfab/ksp-exporter/releases) and get the beta!

-Engine shrouds: Open 3D settings, go to the materials tab and select the fairings material. Set transperancy to 100 and their gone!

**News!**

The support told me:

*Procedural parts (struts) doesn't look so "easy" to handle with the data we currently hace, we need to dig a little bit in the game data in order to find a way to process and render them correctly. In the meantime, as these parts give a very buggy effect to the models, we will simply hide them for now, but we will look at the same time for a workaround to process them correctly.*

Landing gear:

*Your second question refers to one of the things that we will probably do first. We are working on these parts in order to set them in the same state as they actually are in the game. We have the data, we just have to make it works for every animated parts.*

*Btw, we will do an update of ksp processing soon, that will hide bottom shrouds and also fix some scale issues.*

*Thanks, we 'll keep you in touch!*

*AurÃƒÂ©lien*

**Please report compatible or incompatible mods in the comments so I can add them to the list!**

**Mods known incompatible:**

-ATM (Active texture management)

-Texture replacer

-Real Chutes

-Kerbal Engineer

-KW rocketry

-KSPX

-Tweakable Everything

**Mostly compatible:**

-Firespitter

-BDarmory

**Mods known compatible:**

-LazTek SpaceX Launch Pack

-kduffers korp Halo Ships

-KAX

-KAS

-Nova Punch

-Mechjeb

-Infernal Robotics

Yip, ran into the same issue. That must be a bug as in their video the textures worked. [EDIT: The textures are broken because I used the alpha tool, make sure to download the final release on github.] Struts and fuellines are calculated as you launch your craft and I guess itÃ‚Â´s a whole different story to get those to work right.

Crap, it's windows only... Ah well, at least I can look at yours!

> 
> Crap, it's windows only... Ah well, at least I can look at yours!

If you send me the craft, I put it up for you.
Also, how did you guys get the custom backgrounds?

> 
> Also, how did you guys get the custom backgrounds?

When you open the 3D settings open the "lighting" tab and turn "replace background" off. Then go to the "scene" tab and upload your background under "fixed background".

I also recommend using PBR renderer to not make your crafts shine like crazy^^.

![2UmXAp7.png](http://i.imgur.com/2UmXAp7.png)
Thanks!
What's wrong with shiny? All shiny and new, then you launch it and it isn't shiny anymore :-)

> It does not appear to properly handle fairings or engine shrouds. It also does not handle textures at all, though mod parts appear not to be a problem for it.

ThereÃ‚Â´s now a workaround. A staff from Sktechfab told me how to ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You can simply go and set the tranparency of the shroud texture to 100 and theyÃ‚Â´re gone!
Is there anyway to get textures working on linux (currently running the beta version under wine)

Is anyone else having the issue of an uncontrolled zoom-in until it clips through the craft and focuses on the dead center? In order to see crafts I have to continuously scroll out, and even then it's sort of a losing battle. Maybe a problem with FireFox?

> 
> Is anyone else having the issue of an uncontrolled zoom-in...

Yes, the throttle of my joystick did it.

> 
> Is there anyway to get textures working on linux?

Good question! I have no idea, but try to get help here: [http://forum.sketchfab.com/](http://forum.sketchfab.com/)

> 
> Yes, the throttle of my joystick did it.

Holy crap! Never would have thought of that but I do have a stick with its throttle half-raised. Gonna try fixing that.

It works! I also did a PBR render and turned down the glossiness to minimum, and I'm quite happy with the result...

I get the following error: "The file is invalid (Error 13)" when in the uploading phase. Any idea what's causing this and/or how to fix it?

> 
> I get the following error: "The file is invalid (Error 13)" when in the uploading phase. Any idea what's causing this and/or how to fix it?

IÃ‚Â´m sure you checked all the usual error sources? Mods, wrong uploader, wrong file etc...?

Maybe a more precise description of what you did would help. And contacting the sketchfab support might help.
